name: Garden Affairs
description:
What does your perfect life look like?

To decorate your house freely? To foster adorable pets? To take a walk in the garden with your family and relax?
Come and join Garden Affairs. Create the life you’ve always dreamed of!
Beat numerous Match-3 levels with incredible boosters. Get an exciting and fun game experience!

Game Features

Free designing: Choose furniture based on your preferences. Renovate the house to fit your unique style.
Intriguing stories: Explore the secrets hidden in the garden. Defend your house together with your friends.
Fun levels: Beat levels with cool boosters. Enjoy the fun of matching.

Follow us to get more info:
Facebook：https://www.facebook.com/GardenAffairsGames/
